correlated_groups.description: Reentrancy vulnerability confirmed by multiple scanners
Access control vulnerability with LLM augmentation
Unchecked return as part of broader security issues

merged_findings.title: Critical Reentrancy Vulnerability (Confirmed by 4 scanners)
merged_findings.augmented_severity_reasoning: Elevated from HIGH to CRITICAL based on LLM impact analysis showing complete fund drainage risk
merged_findings.combined_description: Reentrancy vulnerability detected by deterministic pattern matching, confirmed by IR analysis, and augmented with exploitation details by LLM analysis. External call at line 15 before state update at line 17 creates exploitable reentrancy condition.
